movie.title: Iron Man
movie.description: When wealthy industrialist Tony Stark is forced to build an armored suit after a life-threatening incident, he ultimately decides to use its technology to fight against evil.

movie.title: Transformers
movie.description: An ancient struggle re-erupts on Earth between two extraterrestrial clans, the heroic Autobots and the evil Decepticons, with a clue to the ultimate power held by a young teenager.

movie.title: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy
movie.actors: Will Ferrell, Christina Applegate, Steve Carell
movie.description: Ron Burgundy is San Diego's top rated newsman in the male dominated broadcasting of the 1970's, but that's all about to change when a new female employee with ambition to burn arrives in his office.

movie.title: 30 Minutes or Less
movie.actors: Jesse Eisenberg, Danny ...z Ansari, Nick Swardson
movie.description: Two fledgling criminals kidnap a pizza delivery guy, strap a bomb to his chest, and inform him that he has mere hours to rob a bank or else...

movie.title: Step Brothers
movie.description: Two aimless middle-aged losers still living at home are forced against their will to become roommates when their parents get married.
